welcomeDescription: Your virtual SIM-based M-Pesa service for foreigners visiting Kenya.
registrationDesc: Sign up using your passport and get access to M-Pesa services instantly.
subscriptionDesc: Choose a plan suitable for tourists and business travelers.
sendReceiveDesc: Send and receive money across borders securely and quickly.
balanceDesc: Check your wallet balance anytime with real-time updates.
settingsDesc: Switch languages, toggle themes, and update your preferences.
fillSendFields: Please fill in all Send Money fields.
fillPayBillFields: Please fill in all Pay Bill fields.
fillTillFields: Please fill in all Till Number fields.
fillPochiFields: Please fill in all Pochi La Biashara fields.
alertSelectPlan: Please select a plan to subscribe.
alertSuccessSubscribe: Thank you for subscribing to the {{plan}}!
title: Register
